plot outline: Karthik (Karthikeya) is an NRI who has no emotions and family attachments. As promised to his father, Karthik visits India and there he gets close to a girl called Anjali (Simrat Kaur). Who is this Anjali? What kind of changes does she bring in Karthi's life? Will Karthik change his mindset? What happens to this love story forms the rest of the story.
title: Prematho Mee Karthik
plot: A materialistic father and son take a thirty-day trip together where they learn about people, value and love, while his father tries to hide his impending death from his son.

Karthik (Karthikeya) is an NRI who has no emotions and family attachments. As promised to his father, Karthik visits India and there he gets close to a girl called Anjali (Simrat Kaur). Who is this Anjali? What kind of changes does she bring in Karthi's life? Will Karthik change his mindset? What happens to this love story forms the rest of the story.
